Mehmet Yilmaz

Developer at Microsoft

Mehmet's Bio

My name is Mehmet Yilmaz and I am a Senior Back-End Developer in Microsoft. I am an accomplished coder and programmer, and I enjoy using my skills to contribute to the exciting technological advances that happen every day at Microsoft. I graduated from Istanbul Technical University in 2005 with a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science.
